Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Vancomycin (0.25 - 64 mcg/ml)
MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with vancomycin addition for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of staphylococci and enterococci.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of gram-positive staphylococci and enterococci, including vancomycin susceptibility testing for Enterococcus spp., Staphylococcus spp., and Staphylococcus aureus (including methicillin-resistant strains), using the MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panel.
